Title: Relates to disclosing certain information prior to qualifying for any reduction in taxation
Summary: Relates to disclosing certain information prior to qualifying for any reduction in taxation on gaming revenue; provides that an independent financial monitor shall be appointed.
LawSection: Racing, Pari-Mutuel Wagering and Breeding Law
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the racing, pari-mutuel wagering and breeding law, in relation to disclosing certain information prior to qualifying for any reduction in taxation
